fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
position: Senior Director, Communications and Government Relations EMEA
goals__remit:
Whirlpool Corporation is the number one major appliance manufacturer in the world, with approximately $21 billion in annual sales, 93,000 employees and 70 manufacturing and technology research centers in 20176.  
The company markets Whirlpool, KitchenAid, Maytag, Consul, Brastemp, Amana, Bauknecht, Jenn-Air, Indesit, Hotpoint and other major brand names in nearly every country throughout the world. In Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) it has approximately 24,000 employees, a sales presence in more than 30 countries and manufacturing sites in eight countries.  
 
The stakeholders' relations related to EU policies are performed by the Regulatory Affairs and Governmental Relations teams, which monitor the development of EU regulations impacting company's products and operations and engage with decision makers.
